class.name: org.genedb.db.hibernate3gen.CvTermRelationship
class.comment: A relationship linking two cvterms. A relationship can be thought of as an edge in a graph, or as a natural language statement about two cvterms. The statement is of the form SUBJECT PREDICATE OBJECT; for example "wing part_of body"

column.name: subject_id
column.comment: the subject of the subj-predicate-obj sentence. In a DAG, this corresponds to the child node

column.name: object_id
column.comment: the object of the subj-predicate-obj sentence. In a DAG, this corresponds to the parent node

column.name: type_id
column.comment: relationship type between subject and object. This is a cvterm, typically from the OBO relationship ontology, although other relationship types are allowed
